description: T4 Crab Apple (Driveway Entrance): Crown reduce to previous most recent reduction pointsT5 Cherry (Opposite Rodney Court): Crown reduce to previous most recent reduction pointsT10 Large Lime (Driveway Entrance): Reduce lateral branches only back to the previous, most recent reduction points, retaining furnishing growthT12 Lime (Opp. No. 39-41): Crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points (approx. 0.5-1.0m) retaining selected shortened furnishing growth and at least 50% of remaining internal fine branch structure for crown continuity.  T14 Lime: Remove dead limb.  Crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points retaining selected shortened furnishing growth and at least 50% of remaining internal fine branch structure for crown continuity.1 x lime (smaller northernmost lime tree in G2): Crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points retaining selected shortened furnishing growth and at least 50% of remaining internal fine branch structure for crown continuity.5 x lime (southernmost lime trees in G2): Reduce lateral branches only back to the previous, most recent reduction points, retaining furnishing growth.
decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
